Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.serialize

Class LineGraphExport

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.serialize.LineGraphExport
public final class LineGraphExport extends Object
Class that contains functions for writing CommitDiffs and (sets of) DiffTrees to a linegraph file.
Author:
Paul Bittner, Kevin Jedelhauser

  • Method Details

    • toLineGraphFormat

      public static org.variantsync.functjonal.Pair<DiffTreeSerializeDebugData,​String> toLineGraphFormat​(DiffTree diffTree, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Exports the given DiffTree to a linegraph String. No file will be written.
      Parameters:
      diffTree - The difftree to export to linegraph format.
      options - Configuration options for the export, such as the format used for node and edge labels.
      Returns:
      A pair holding some debug information and the produced linegraph as a string.

    • toLineGraphFormat

      public static org.variantsync.functjonal.Pair<AnalysisResult,​String> toLineGraphFormat​(String repoName, Iterable<DiffTree> trees, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Exports the given DiffTrees that originated from a repository with the given name.
      Parameters:
      repoName - The name of the repository, the given DiffTrees originated from.
      trees - The set of trees to export.
      options - Configuration options for the export, such as the format used for node and edge labels.
      Returns:
      A pair of (1) metadata about the exported DiffTrees, and (2) the produced linegraph as String.

    • toLineGraphFormat

      public static org.variantsync.functjonal.Pair<AnalysisResult,​String> toLineGraphFormat​(Iterable<DiffTree> trees, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Same as toLineGraphFormat(String, Iterable, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions) but with an unkown repository.

    • toLineGraphFormat

      public static AnalysisResult toLineGraphFormat​(CommitDiff commitDiff, StringBuilder lineGraph, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Same as toLineGraphFormat(String, CommitDiff, StringBuilder, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions) but with an unkown repository.

    • toLineGraphFormat

      public static AnalysisResult toLineGraphFormat​(String repoName, CommitDiff commitDiff, StringBuilder lineGraph, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Writes the given commitDiff in linegraph format to the given StringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      repoName - The name of the repository from which the given CommitDiff originated.
      commitDiff - The diff to convert to line graph format.
      lineGraph - The string builder to write the result to.
      options - Configuration options for the export, such as the format used for node and edge labels.
      Returns:
      The number of the next diff tree to export (updated value of treeCounter).

    • composeTreeInLineGraph

      public static void composeTreeInLineGraph​(StringBuilder lineGraph, DiffTreeSource source, String nodesAndEdges, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions options)
      Produces the final linegraph file content. Creates a linegraph header from the given DiffTreeSource using the DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions.treeFormat in the given options. Then appends the already created file content for nodes and edges.
      Parameters:
      lineGraph - The string builder to write the result to.
      source - The DiffTreeSource that describes where the DiffTree whose content is written to the file originated from.
      nodesAndEdges - Result from toLineGraphFormat(DiffTree, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions). Holds all nodes and edges in linegraph format, separated by a newline each.
      options - DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions used to determine the treeFormat for the header.
